programme.title: Sunny Again Tomorrow - EP 79
programme.desc: Witnessing how deeply Heni is adored by her grandmother, Zhi-en feels threatened and resolves to stop En-ai from ever regaining her memories. To ensure this, Zhi-en secretly switches En-ai's medication, determined to keep the past buried.

programme.title: Sunny Again Tomorrow - EP 80
programme.desc: The man who once claimed that Shuijing was dead approaches Shanxi again, demanding hush money. They are unaware that Youluo is secretly witnessing the exchange.

programme.title: Sour, Salty & Alive - EP 5
programme.desc: Savoury, sour, pungent and very much alive. Welcome to the delicious world of ferments from Asia. Fermentation is not just a way to preserve food, it's our gastronomic identity. From Japan to South Korea, and the Philippines to New Zealand, the bounty from the forests, fields and sea are pickled, preserved, and altered by microbes and good bacteria. This series is all about the magic of fermentation - celebrating culinary wisdom, culture and history.

programme.title: Foodie Sisters S2 - EP 5
programme.desc: "Foodie Sisters" Xiao and May embarked on a food challenge to bring viewers to different corner of Taiwan in search of good tasting food from places like Keelong, Xinzhu and Taoyuan.

programme.title: Love Scout - EP 18
programme.desc: After being sabotaged by competitors and pressured by investors, Zhiyun thanks Enhao for showing her she doesnt have to carry everything alone.

programme.title: Summer Rebels

With more than seventeen thousand islands scattered across over five million kilometers and three time zones that needs a lifetime to explore and appreciate its natural beauty. Same with its title, the program sums it all up into twenty-five must-visit authentic destinations that simply cannot be missed. From defining beaches to magical mountains and wild forests, be prepared to be amazed by authentic Indonesia.

programme.title: Ekspedisi Ekstrem - EP 4
programme.desc: Ekspedisi Ekstrem explores the human stories behind those living in unusual and extraordinary spaces. Each week, a celebrity guest will follow the host for a stay with communities living in remote, rugged terrains. Stepping out of their comfort zones, they will learn essential livelihood skills and be tasked with challenges that will test their skills and character. At the same time, Ekspedisi Ekstrem gives an intimate glimpse of the communities' unique dwellings and their ways to survive.
